name: Utrust
description: Utrust (UTK) is the legacy token of the former Utrust project, which merged into the xMoney ecosystem. UTK is no longer the active utility token of xMoney. The new token, XMN, is a MiCA-compliant multi-functional token powering payments, loyalty, governance, and treasury functions within the regulated xMoney financial ecosystem. UTK holders are able to upgrade their tokens to XMN through the official upgrade website: https://upgradeutk.xmoney.com. For more information on the new token, please refer to https://www.xmoney.com/token.
